channel.title: [PI] Tells me I have to much NPC's
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]FIXED![/b][/size]
[s]I created an NPC earlier so I could add another shop, when I compiled it worked fine, but when I ran the client, I logged in and it froze. I looked in the command prompt and it said I had to many NPC's.. Can somebody help me with this?[/s] [s]^^ Coded wrong New problem:
Case 587 = The guy I want to spawn. 23 = The shop number.
http://gyazo.com/9b9a537570515588697cdb2b80fc1d1e.png
http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?59107-Basic-Tutorial-4-How-To-Make-Shops-PI Followed that tutorial.
Source is Hybrid Pvp.[/s]

item.title: [PI] Tells me I have to much NPC's
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

[quote=“EatMyWhiteStuff, post:9, topic:450578”]It actually wasn’t this that caused the problem.
It was a dialogue thing I added.

SO SHUDDUP :([/quote]

Gotcha. d:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Tells me I have to much NPC's
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

[quote=“EatMyWhiteStuff, post:7, topic:450578”]My bad - was fixing other stuff.
But yeah, I did code it wrong, I gave it the same Shop ID as Donator Shop, but now I get this.

Case 587 = The guy I want to spawn.
23 = The shop number.

http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?59107-Basic-Tutorial-4-How-To-Make-Shops-PI
Followed that tutorial.[/quote]

Good job.
You now know level 1 newbie coding.
<3

item.title: [PI] Tells me I have to much NPC's
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

DAn0194:

1.Just start deleting the npcs you don’t use in game

I see what you’re trying to imply, but I don’t think that’ll make a difference.
He added an incorrectly coded NPC
it’s whats crashing the client.
i’d say to just delete the new NPC and use a different one.
